name: Texan Chess
description:
Texan Chess is a 3D Physics Sandbox Strategy game where 2 or more players take turns shooting, exploding, and whacking chess pieces around in an effort to take out the enemy's King. Checkmate!

**Gamepad Recommended**

Credits:

- Lead Designer, Level Design, Producer: Justin Meyer

- Programmer, Designer: Ryan Pratt

- UI Design, Particles, Sound Effects: Sol Pannuto

- 3D Modeling, Environmental Artist: Garrett Chinian

- 3D Modeling, Character Models: Tariq Thomas

**All used Music Tracks were retrieved from Pond5.com**

- Bluegrass Banjo Bonanza, by BarBeeCues

- The Tale of Buckaroo Bill, by eamonnwatt
